name: Love Next Door
description:
Have you ever looked at a door and thought, “Wow, I’d love to date that?” Well now you can, in Love Next Door! Swipe on a door you want to date and talk your way into their hearts! Don't worry about how crazy they are... This project was created in 2 days for MEGA's April Fools Game Jam 2022 with the theme of “unhinged”!

How to play:

Use your mouse to swipe left or right on a door

Click to progress text or make choices

Try to get all 6 endings!

Credits: 

Programmer: JT Torrea

Artists: Allena Zhu, Cindy Gao Liang, Nevaeh Li

Narrative: Jonan Pho 

Music: Daniel Montes de Oca Tellez
